title: 78. For God So Loved Us
verses:
For God so loved us,
He sent the Savior:
For God so loved us,
And loves me too.

He sent the Savior,
The blest Redeemer;
He sent the Savior
To set me free.

He bade me welcome,
O word of mercy;
He bade me welcome,
O voice divine.

Glory and honor,
O Love eternal,
To Him be given
while life shall last.
chorus:
Love so unending!
Iâ€™ll sing His praises,
God loves His children,
Loves even me.
